snippet: An exhibition at Somerset House in London gives a flavor of the Jamaica-born style of the 1950s and early 1960s, which is making a comeback.
lead_paragraph: An exhibition at Somerset House in London gives a flavor of the Jamaica-born style of the 1950s and early 1960s, which is making a comeback.

headline.print_headline: British Exhibition Celelbrates Rudeboy Style, a Transplanted Jamaican Culture
